mods.abstract: Three color window card (white, green, and blue on brown) announcing the Riverdance 20th Anniversary World Tour at the Durham Performing Arts Center from June 7 to 12. Poster features dingbats of a deer head, Celtic shapes, and other ornaments.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
